item.description:
The Boston Band Crush (http://bostonbandcrush.org/) blog is hosting a "Holiday Spectacular" show at Brighton Music Hall with some great local bands:

Freezepop: http://www.freezepop.net/news/
Sidewalk Driver: http://sidewalkdriver.com/
The Field Effect: http://thefieldeffectmusic.com/
Emily Peal: http://emilypeal.bandcamp.com/

The show starts at 9PM. I'll send my cell number beforehand and be waiting at the front bar from 8:45PM. I'm also free to meet up at Tavern in the Square (across the street from Brighton Music Hall) for anyone interested in grabbing a bite beforehand.

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/events/494693027230082/
Tickets ($12) : http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/01004958E98BB0FA?c=rmk-lnneweng_web_freezepop_bmh_110212
item.name: Boston Band Crush: Freezepop, Sidewalk Driver, The Field Effect, Emily Peal
